Question: This person favoured Major over Heseltine in the leadership contest, but her support for him weakened in later years.
Hints: Trade union membership also fell, from 13.5 million in 1979 to fewer than 10 million by the time this person left office in 1990.
Some Heathite Conservatives in the Cabinet, the so-called "wets", expressed doubt over this person's policies.
Although **** won the first ballot, Heseltine attracted sufficient support (152 votes) to force a second ballot.
